Kim Jong Il's work released in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work released in Germany 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Germany brought out in booklet Kim Jong Il's famous work "On The Juche Idea" on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Expounded in the work published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982) are the philosophical and socio-historical principles of the Juche idea and its guiding principles in the revolution and construction.
